summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI SEO Growth Engine - Public Blog and Advanced SEO APIs. All 16 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend blog pages fully functional with listing, individual post pages, category filtering, and search.

issues: Only 1 blog card visible without scrolling on desktop (1920x1080). Consider showing 2-3 cards per row for better discoverability

critical_code_review_comments: Public blog endpoints correctly serve published posts without authentication
Individual post pages load correctly with full content, FAQs, and metadata
Category and region filters work as expected on the blog listing page
Advanced SEO endpoints properly require admin authentication
Social media posts generation creates draft posts for Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook
Trending keywords simulated data provides realistic regional variations
Multi-language status correctly tracks content counts per language
seed_data_creation: 2 blog posts exist and are published: 'Used Cars in Dar es Salaam: Buy Smart in Tanzania' (vehicles, 1278 words) and 'Buying Used Phones in Dar es Salaam: Smart Tips' (electronics, 649 words)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Public Blog and Advanced SEO features verified working. Blog pages at /blog (listing) and /blog/{slug} (individual posts) render correctly with proper SEO metadata. Advanced SEO endpoints require admin auth. Social posts generated for Twitter/LinkedIn/Facebook are stored in 'draft' status.

public_blog_api.notes: Returns published posts with pagination, filtering by category/country
Returns full post by slug including content, FAQs, keywords, metadata

advanced_seo_api_authenticated.notes: Analyzes blog posts and suggests internal links to listings/categories
Generates social media posts for Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook from blog content
Returns trending keywords by region (TZ, KE, DE, etc.) with trend scores
Analyzes gaps between trending keywords and existing content
Returns backlink opportunities by region with domain authority scores
Returns content counts and status for en/de/sw languages

features_verified: Category filters (Vehicles, Electronics, Properties, General, Safety Tips, Buying Guide)
Region filters with country flags (TZ, KE, DE, UG, NG, ZA)
Blog cards with date, reading time, excerpt, Read More link
Article title, date, reading time, word count
Full article content with headings, paragraphs, bullet lists

simulated_data_note: Trending keywords, backlink opportunities, and traffic analytics are simulated/sample data based on regions. Social posts are stored in the database.
